content: I remember getting my Sigma 24-70mm f/2.8 lens on February 10th, and it's been a game-changer for my indoor photography. I've been using it non-stop for my product photography projects. Speaking of which, do you have any recommendations for remote shutter releases? I recently got a set of three from Amazon on February 22nd, but I'm curious to know if there are any other good options out there.
